text: The Ripley Fire Lookout Tower, on Joe Crihfield Rd. in Ripley, Tennessee, was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2020. It was built around 1970 for the Tennessee Division of Forestry. It is also known as Edith tower. ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Lauderdale County, Tennessee Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1970 Category:Fire lookout towers in Tennessee
title: Ripley Fire Lookout Tower
